text: I think I want to go down the route of gameplay programming, but not really sure at this point - I'm experimenting with OpenGL at the moment in uni and that's super interesting so potentially graphical programming could be a pathway for me to go down

You’re in your first year so there is still plenty of time to experiment. Each year you will probably find that you migrate more towards one area over the other. While you’re just starting out I recommend you try as much as possible and seeing what appeals the most.
